column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I did order the pork skewers and they were just so dry and lacked the juiciness you get from the meat in Spain. The sangria and chocolate cake were good
column2: but by the time the desserts had arrived I was too disappointed in my two tapas I had just had. Â Too many "tapas" places lose their authenticity to Spanish cuisine and I hope ba ba reeba won't be a victim.
